Prefect Marestella:
We, Orcs, came to Aden at the request of the weak Human king. Some of my brethren believe this shows that Humans have finally realized their inadequacies. I prefer to be more cautious, however.
Humans have a long history of treachery when it comes to their dealings with Orcs.
While we are here, I will act as the eyes and ears of my people to ensure we are dealt with honorably...
